column4: Hello i am having problems, how can I copy and paste things out of my shell to a getedit page
highlight the text and ctrl-shift-c to copy from terminal
ctrl-shift-v to paste to terminal
I haven't learned how to select all in terminal :/
what text are you trying to select? is it output from a command you want to send to gedit?
gksudo gedit /path/to/file
nothing came up.
what is the path to the file?
I know.
Unreal3.2/unrealircd.cpnf
Unreal3.2/unrealircd.conf
gksudo gedit ~/Unreal3.2/unrealircd.conf
it says starting admin something then it disappears, nothing is popping up.
don't know what to tell you. You do have a GUI installation correct?
don't use pastebinit on files you don't want to publish. I believe the pastebin will delete the entry in 24 hours unless you selected to save it longer.
I didn't do anything, it just made a pastebin itself.
if you don't tell us what the link is then no
ok.
I mean I could go to pastebin.com and look at the most recent posts but honestly I am not that interested :)
but I thought you said no one can find it >.>
you posted to a public site on the internet it can be found but who is going to go looking for it is the question.
I just want it to delete, and idk how.
go to the link, there may be an option there for you to delete it
